Projects

My primary goal as a developer is to build a skillset that will allow me to be highly dynamic and well rounded in any programming project.

Language/frameworks:

Python

Description:

A command line based game developed in a unit assignment at UNE. Demonstrates file read and writes with highscore collecting.

Description:
